links.title: Dice Roller
links.description: A very minimal dice roller for tabletop games

links.title: Light | Part of the Commands Series
links.description: This data pack provides a light metter to the player.

links.title: Way-points | Part of the Commands Series
links.description: This pack provides way-points to any survival single or multiplayer. This locations are shared with every player on servers. With some other data packs on this series any player can teleport to any way-point with a single command.

links.title: Telerports | Library | Part of the Commands Serie
links.description: This is a module for Commands Core that provides teleporting capabilities to other data packs from this same series using scoreboards.

links.title: GPS | Part of the Commands Series
links.description: This is yet another coordinates HUD but it also provides functionalities to some of the next data packs.

links.title: Commands Core
links.description: This is the core data pack for some of my upcoming data packs.

links.title: NBTCrafter | NBT Crafting Data Pack
links.description: Yep, I made another NBT crafting data pack for Minecraft 1.16. But this is different from others because the Fabricator behaves just as a Crafting Table does. Also it has a custom enchantment system, called Spells, they are used with a Spell Caster.

links.title: Cube Creator | v0.1 Alpha
links.description: Cube Creator is an IDE meant for data packs and resource packs for Minecraft Java Edition.

links.title: Futuristic UI [1.12, 1.14, 1.15, 1.16]
links.description: This is a Futuristic GUI for Minecraft. Every GUI element is inspired by some kind of cyberpunk style.
